Docs.summary: SDCA is a general training algorithm for (generalized) linear models such as support vector machine, linear regression, logistic regression, and so on. SDCA binary classification trainer family includes several sealed members: (1) supports general loss functions and returns . (2) essentially trains a regularized logistic regression model. Because logistic regression naturally provide probability output, this generated model's type is . where is and is .
